paper_abstract: Data summarization has recently received considerable attention in the knowledge systems community. This paper discusses the design of data summarization query system. Based on an initial analysis of requirement representations in data summarization, the study develops a generic organization of ontology for data summarization query system. Furthermore, this paper proposes a framework of ontology-based query language of data summarization based on the proposed ontology structure. A prototype project of data summarization ontology-based Query by Examples (QBE) for summarizing the data incompleteness demonstrates the effectiveness of the proposed framework.
